content.body: So I guess Chromium doesn't really still use IRC (https://www.chromium.org/developers/irc) but does it actually have any widely used public chat system these days?

I was asking a googler with whom I am collaborating that the externally-facing chat is an invite-only slack and there's an internal-only chat where all the conversations happen. (but maybe there's another externally-facing I don't know)

> <@timothygu:matrix.org> It looks like Safari Technical Preview has AbortSignal.abort(). https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=223071

Thanks â€” we unfortunately donâ€™t yet have a way to represent data for Safari Technical Preview in BCD (though I think we will soon). But regardless itâ€™s great know we do actually have two implementations.

content.body: sideshowbarker: https://github.com/mdn/browser-compat-data/pull/10334 should be done soonish, Florian Scholz says that the remaining work is to update the BCD rendering code in yari.

This whole show needs to go on another 5 years or so before it becomes more than half my life. Which is a new way of making me feel old :p
